column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////The deep dish: This was my first time having real "deep dish" pizza and I loved it! I was expecting it to be loaded with bread
column2: but it was the total opposite. The crust is thin
column3: crisp and loaded with toppings (a little too much toppings for me) but it's delicious! I was with a party of 5 and we split 2 mediums with about 3 slices left over.
